title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1104/93 of 5 May 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1912/92 laying down detailed implementing rules for the specific measures for supplying the Canary Islands with products from the beef and veal sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1104/93 of 5 May 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1912/92 laying down detailed implementing rules for the specific measures for supplying the Canary Islands with products from the beef and veal sector
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 1912/92 is hereby replaced by the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 6 May 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 May 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 378, 23. 12. 1992, p. 23.
(3) OJ No L 192, 11. 7. 1992, p. 31.
(4) OJ No L 57, 10. 3. 1993, p. 9.
ANNEX
'ANNEX I
Canary Islands: forecast supply balance for beef and veal sector products for period 1 July 1992 to 30 June 1993
/* Tables: see OJ */
